title: Acute chest pain with cardiac risk factors
source: Synthetic case based on Manchester Triage System flowchart 'Chest Pain'

patient.name: Robert Thompson
patient.chief_complaint: Crushing chest pain radiating to left arm and jaw, started 45 minutes ago while resting
patient.onset: 45 minutes ago, sudden onset at rest
patient.notes: Patient appears anxious and diaphoretic. ECG not yet performed.
